name: 黃乾怡
objective:
本課程在介紹並討論衡量系統可靠度常用的機率模式、串連系統、並連系統及混合式系統的可靠度特性及其評估方式。此外也介紹評估實際系統時常用的統計方法及資料蒐集和推論的技巧，最後討論可修護系統的可靠度衡量。
This class will review selective subjects (such as definition of reliability, reliability target setting and assurance, design for reliability, reliability tests, etc.) as highlighted in the text book as an initial establishment of the background knowledge. The reliability tests and corresponding conditions for environment-compliant electronics products will then be introduced as special topics. Invited speaker(s) from electronics industry will describe experience in reliability qualification, followed by review of journal papers in the area of reliability engineering and management.
schedule:
Week 1 基本可靠度原理
Week 2 可靠度目標訂定配當與保固
Week 3 系統可靠度模式
Week 4 可靠度設計植入
Week 5-6 可靠度設計分析驗證
Week 7-8可靠度試驗之規劃與執行
Week 9 期中考
Week 10-12國際無鉛產品壽命評估方法（業界講師）
Week 13-14綠色供應鏈可靠度測試方法與條件（業界講師）
Week 15 ~ 18 Journal paper review (oral presentation)
scorePolicy:
期中考40%
學期報告(Oral presentation) 30%
出席與上課表現30%
materials:
1.可靠度保證-工程與管理技術之應用 柯煇耀編著 第四版
2.Quality Control by Dale H. Besterfield (8th edition) – Chapter 11 Reliability
3.綠色供應鏈可靠度測試方法與條件、國際無鉛產品壽命評估方法 - 工業技術研究院技術報告
